an10.126:1.1: “Dasayime, bhikkhave, dhamma ragavinayapariyosana honti dosavinayapariyosana honti mohavinayapariyosana honti, nannatra sugatavinaya.
an10.126:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, dasa dhamma ragavinayapariyosana honti dosavinayapariyosana honti mohavinayapariyosana honti, nannatra sugatavinaya”ti.
